scripts.pack: npm run cli-tools:check && cd app && DEVECO_SDK_HOME=../../../arkoala/ohos-sdk/ohos-sdk ../command-line-tools/hvigor/bin/hvigorw --no-daemon --mode module -p product=default -p module=arkoala@default assembleHar
scripts.har-arm32: npm run --prefix ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-arkoala-har.mjs --arch arm32 && npm run pack
scripts.har-arm64: npm run --prefix ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-arkoala-har.mjs --arch arm64 && npm run pack
scripts.har-universal: npm run --prefix ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk download && node scripts/build-arkoala-har-universal.mjs && npm run pack
scripts.cli-tools:download:bz: node ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk/scripts/openlab-cli.mjs download -p command-line-tools -v 5.0.3502 -f command-line-tools.5.0.3502.zip -d command-line-tools && npm run cli-tools:chmod:bz
scripts.cli-tools:download:yz: node ../../arkoala/ohos-sdk/scripts/gitlab-cli.mjs download -p deveco-tools -v 5.0.1300 -f deveco-tools.5.0.1300.zip -d command-line-tools && npm run cli-tools:chmod:yz
scripts.cli-tools:download: test "$KOALA_BZ" = "0" && npm run cli-tools:download:yz || npm run cli-tools:download:bz
